sense.name: a motion picture, a film, artistic creation
sense.examples: How many movies did Alfred Hitchcock make? Last night we went to the movies and saw a good thriller. It was just like in the movies. John thought the movie was actually better than the book. Mary showed us some home movies of her children.

sense.name: the medium of film
sense.examples: They are setting up lights and movie cameras. A special movie projector is needed for IMAX films. Movies and television have changed society in many ways. This movie is damaged, take it back to the video store for a replacement copy.
